reviewText: Another good DVD by Flores. The techniques are so simple I wasn't sure my HS kids would get into them, but even the basketball star upperclassmen (taking art as an elective and nothing else) dived in. The results of simple rolling, cutting, scoring, and pleating are much more sophisticated than you'd imagine from the ease of construction. Using rich textured and metallic papers raises the bar too. Of particular note were the cut paper "relief" panels when placed on top of contrasting backgrounds. Excellent outcomes.
